author: Joseph Guzman
title: WHO: Pandemic is accelerating - The Hill
description: WHO: Pandemic is accelerating The Hill Social distancing won't stop 'accelerating' coronavirus pandemic, WHO warns New York Post Coronavirus pandemic is accelerating as cases eclipse 350,000, WHO says CNBC WHO chief warns coronavirus pandemic is 'accelerating…
content:
The World Health Organization (WHO) says the coronavirus pandemic is accelerating, as more than 300,000 cases have been confirmed worldwide and physical distancing measures are appearing not to be enough to stop the spread.  
Asking people to stay at home an… [+1616 chars]
